oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Navy Submarine Chaser launched by Mrs. Francis Craig in Nashville, Tennessee, 1942 September
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the launch of a World War II Navy submarine chaser, built in Nashville, and dedicated by Mrs. Francis Craig, circa September 1942. The Nashville Bridge Company built this vessel at a facility along the Cumberland River near downtown Nashville. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Craig family
Nashville Bridge Company
